node.detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，與太太（第 #834 宗個案患者）共同前往瑞士及法國巴黎，3 月中一同返港，檢疫期間並無病徵。 4 月 6 日所取的樣本屬陽性，由檢疫中心送院。
node.detail_en: The patient has good past health and went to Switzerland and Paris, France with his wife, patient #834. He returned to Hong Kong with his wife in mid-March. During the quarantine period, he showed no symptoms. On April 6, his test results came back positive and he was transferred to hospital from the Quarantine Centre.
node.classification_zh: 輸入個案的密切接觸者
